subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Johnson, who has won nine times on the PGA Tour but has yet to win a major, was relaxed en route to a six-under-par 66 and a one-shot lead after the first round.
snippet: Johnson, who has won nine times on the PGA Tour but has yet to win a major, was relaxed en route to a six-under-par 66 and a one-shot lead after the first round.
